info.brief_description: This is the first story I created so I will let it go anywhere with only 2 limitations
info.description: This story is about John, a 15 year old boy who's in high school and gets the ability to swap body parts and traits.(this does include traits such as thoughts, memories, personalities, etc.) He can even trade away his memory of the power if he wants. He can also do a full body swap if he wants to. I will let you decide where it goes from here. I will also let you decide how he gets the ability. Since this is my first story, I only have 2 rules: No killing the main character, and no bad grammar that I can't understand. If I can't understand it, it's more than likely other people won't understand it. If the grammar is this bad, I will delete the chapter. This isn't a rule it's only a suggestion, try to keep the swapping with girls only. Also try to stick to the story board. Add as many characters as you want. Just try to keep the rating at 18+.
